page.title: 15A day in the life of ...
page.content: My walk to school is boring and long. 7.30 am is too early for me to get up, but my alarm clock reminds me to every morning. On my route to school I pass the Epsom Downs and Tattenham Corner. The road where Tattenham Corner and Merland Rise cross is always busy with heavy traffic. Approaching Chetwode Road I begin to see more people going to school. The timetable varies but the day always starts at 8.45 am. There are 4 periods in the early part of the morning, break, 2 periods, lunch from 1 pm to 2.20 pm,then a further 2 periods before deregistration at 3.40 pm. Each lesson lasts 35 minutes, but subjects often use double periods.
